name: Block Drop (itch)
description:
Thank you for checking out my game!

Switch between difficulties with 1-2-3 keys on the keyboard! A key, and the D key the move left and right! S key to warp the facing direction!

The objective is to stay alive for as long as possible, by dodging the falling blocks, limited to only one room, the difficulty is set on 3 to begin with, however if this is a little much feel free to tone it down a level.

I would love to hear every bit of feedback! Enjoy the rest of the game jam!

ScoreSpace Jam #13
